description: Florida's guidelines say slaves developed skills they could use for their "benefit." DeSantis says the language is similar to the College Board's.

description: Studies show that several tick-borne illnesses are becoming more prevalent because of climate change.

description: Hulu's smart, raunchy sleeper hit from Chris Estrada follows two very different cousins in South Central L.A.

title: Exclusive: For the First Time, New Tech Enables Paralyzed Man To Move and Feel Again
description: Keith Thomas was paralyzed from the chest down after a diving accident. He can move and feel his arms again due to a novel technology.

title: A Japanese City Apologizes After Giving Advice to Pregnant Women on How to Be Better to Men
description: Gender issues have become an increasingly urgent topic of concern in Japan.

description: Around 60% of the U.S. population is under a heat advisory or flood warning or amid high temperatures and the expectation of severe storms.

description: If current trends continue, first China, and later in India, will zoom past the U.S. economy by 2073.

description: Climate change has seen the price of the staple surge 300%, making it more expensive than even gas.

title: Singapore Hangs First Woman Since 2004, Amid Fresh Wave of Drug-Related Executions
description: Singapore authorities insist capital punishment is important to halting drug demand and supply.

title: Bolivia Is Now Using China’s Yuan for Trade, Challenging Global Dominance of U.S. Dollar
description: Bolivia is the latest country in South America to regularly use the Chinese currency in a growing challenge to the hegemony of the U.S. dollar for international financial transactions.

title: ‘Personal Color Analysis’ Has Gone Viral—Fueling a Tourism Boom for South Korea
description: Personal color analysis aims to assign individuals flattering colors that can inform their choices around clothing, makeup and accessories based on their complexions and skin tones.
